description.0: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

0.0: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <cryo>2%</cryo> every second up to a max of <cryo>20%</cryo>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <cryo>4%</cryo> per second until it reaches 0%.

1.0: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <cryo>2.5%</cryo> every second up to a max of <cryo>25%</cryo>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <cryo>5%</cryo> per second until it reaches 0%.

2.0: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <cryo>3%</cryo> every second up to a max of <cryo>30%</cryo>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <cryo>6%</cryo> per second until it reaches 0%.

3.0: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <cryo>3.5%</cryo> every second up to a max of <cryo>35%</cryo>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <cryo>7%</cryo> per second until it reaches 0%.

4.0: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <cryo>4%</cryo> every second up to a max of <cryo>40%</cryo>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <cryo>8%</cryo> per second until it reaches 0%.
